levels.description:
Attack Interval <@ba.vup>reduces slightly</> and every attack inflicts <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> for {attack@sluggish} seconds;
<$ba.charged>Charged</> effect: ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> and instead of <$ba.sluggish>Slowing</>, <$ba.root>Binds</> targets for <@ba.vup>{attack@root}</> seconds
